item.description:
Letting Go of Self-Judgment and Criticism

Do you have a self critical and self-judgmental mind? Learn how to witness it without falling prey to your mind. Learn tips and techniques to be freer and change your relationship to your mind to be more positive and supportive.

1:00 pm - 3:00 pm

(Cost $30 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Letting Go of Self-Judgment and Criticism
